title: Wild Man Holding a Shield with a Hound
provenance_text:
Martin Schongauer [1430?-1491]. William Esdaile [1758-1837], London, England, until 1837, (L.2617); Estate of William Esdaile, until June 1840. Estate of William Esdaile sale, June 11, 1840 until June 16, 1840. Robert Balmanno [1780-1866], London, England, (L.213). Hermann Weber [1817-1854], Bonn, Germany, until 1854, (L.1383); Estate of Hermann Webber, September 1855; Estate of Hermann Webber sale, on September 17, 1855. Dr. August Str채ter [1810-1897], Aachen, Germany, until 1897, (L.787); Estate of Dr. August Str채ter, until May 1898; Estate of Dr. August Str채ter sale, May 10, 1898 until May 14, 1898. P. von Baldinger-Seidenberg [-1911] sale, Stuttgart, Germany, until 1911, (L.212); Estate of P. von Baldinger-Seidenberg, until May 1912; Estate of P. von Baldinger-Seidenberg sale, May 7, 1912 until May 11, 1912. Cortland Field Bishop [1870-1935], New York, until March 1935, (L.2770b); Estate of Cortland Field Bishop, March 1935 until November 1935. Estate of Cortland Field Bishop sale, November 19, 1935? until November 20, 1935?. (Sold at Kennedy Galleries [1952-], New York, stock no. A70789); Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), until April 1, 1973; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Under review by CGK.

creator.death_place: Breisach am Rhein (Freiburg district, Baden-W체rttemberg, Germany)
